import React, { useState } from "react"; function EmployeeCreate() { const [verificationStep, setVerificationStep] = useState(0); const [values, setValues] = useState({ name : " ", email : " ", Gender : " ", Mobile : " ", current_address : " ", Permanent_Address :" ", pincode : " ", date_of_birth : " ", blood_group : " ", pan_number : " ", pan_photo : " ", Aadhar_number : " ", Aadhar_pic : " ", Account_number : " ", Account_pic : " ", loan_amount : " ", partner_name : " ", partner_code : " ", partner_bank_account : " ", partner_ifsc_code : " ", partner_payout : " ", insurance_partner_name : " ", insurance_partner_code : " ", insurance_partner_bank_account : " ", insurance_partner_ifsc_code : " ", insurance_partner_payout : " " }) const [error, setError] = useState({ name : " ", email : " ", Gender : " ", Mobile : " ", current_address : " ", Permanent_Address :" ", pincode : " ", date_of_birth : " ", blood_group : " ", pan_number : " ", pan_photo : " ", Aadhar_number : " ", Aadhar_pic : " ", Account_number : " ", Account_pic : " ", loan_amount : " ", partner_name : " ", partner_code : " ", partner_bank_account : " ", partner_ifsc_code : " ", partner_payout : " ", insurance_partner_name : " ", insurance_partner_code : " ", insurance_partner_bank_account : " ", insurance_partner_ifsc_code : " ", insurance_partner_payout : " " }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ const { name, value } = e.target; setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }); if (name === 'name' && value.length < 2) { setError(prevErrors => ({ ...prevErrors, name: " * Name is required" })); }else if(name === 'email' && !/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(value)){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, email : " * email is not vailed"})); }else if(name === 'Gender' && value.lenght < 5){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, Gender : "* Gender is required"})); }else if(name === 'Mobile' && value.lenght !== 10){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, Mobile : "* mobile number is not vailed"})) }else if(name === 'current_address' && value.lenght <1){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, current_address : " * current address is required"})) }else if(name === 'Permanent_Address' && value.lenght < 1){ setError(prevErrors => setError({...prevErrors, Permanent_Address : "* permanent_address is required"})) }else if(name === 'pincode' && value.lenght !== 6){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, pincode : "* pincode not vailed"})) }else if(name === 'date_of_birth' && value.length > 0){ setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, date_of_birth : '* date_of_birth is required'})) }else if (name === 'blood_group' && value.lenght > 0) { setError(prevErrors => ({...prevErrors, blood_group : '* blood group is required'})) }esle } const handleNextClick = () => { setVerificationStep(verificationStep + 1); } const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log("values === ", values); } return ( <>
